title: Chemometrics, health and environmental risk assessments of commonly consumed biscuits in Lagos and Ibadan metropolises, Southwestern Nigeria
content:
Publication date: 30 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 14

Author(s): Chionyedua T. Onwordi, Josephat U. Izunobi, Chukwudi N. Adiele, Aderonke O. Oyeyiola, Adelani J. Bamtefa, Adebola I. Akinjokun, Leslie F. Petrik
